author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-5907: The hdfs write cache can cause a reader to see a corrupted state. It now defaults to off, and if you were using solr.hdfs.blockcache.write.enabled explicitly, you should set it to false.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-5907: The hdfs write cache can cause a reader to see a corrupted state. It now defaults to off, and if you were using solr.hdfs.blockcache.write.enabled explicitly, you should set it to false.
